name: Boundless Automation, LLC
description:
BOUNDLESS is a technology company for mobile & web startups. We help entrepreneurs create awesome.
We love to create, and helping startups build their apps allows us to do that. We don't cut corners, we don't use aging technologies, and we don't use do-it-yourself frameworks. With over 20 years of experience, we know how to build kick-ass systems from nothing, and we know how to bring your ideas to life.
